name: Looper Car 2
description:
You know Looper Car? A game made by Havellama and LucCozYes(me).

Well, we have a second one now. Made by LucCozYes(me)

music from Havellama

ok i spent about 2 days and 1 night making this and i only slept for about 4 hours so

play it haha.

NOTE: Make sure to save when you wanna stop playing and press load when you wanna load your progress.
